info.description:
ü§ù # **Euphoria** [![build](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli/Publish%20to%20PyPI/main?style=for-the-badge)](https://github.com/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli/actions/workflows/publish_to_pypi.yml) [![Tests](https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli/Project%20Test%20Cases%20and%20linting/main?style=for-the-badge&label=Tests)](https://github.com/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli/actions/workflows/run_tests.yml) ![PyPI Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/euphoria-cli?style=for-the-badge&color=0d7ebf) [![PyPI License](https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/euphoria-cli?style=for-the-badge&color=6e2d75)](https://github.com/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli/blob/main/LICENSE) ![Maintenance](https://img.shields.io/maintenance/yes/2021?style=for-the-badge) ![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/Made%20With-Python%203.9.5-blue.svg?style=for-the-badge&logo=Python&color=0d7ebf) ![formatter](https://img.shields.io/badge/Code%20Style-Black-black?style=for-the-badge) [![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg?style=for-the-badge&color=107f67)](http://makeapullrequest.com) ![HODL](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=MADE%20FOR&message=WAGMI%20hodlers&style=for-the-badge&color=842628&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=)
[Euphoria](https://euphoria.money/) is an algorithmic reserve currency protocol on [Harmony](https://www.harmony.one/) based on the WAGMI token. Each WAGMI token is backed by a basket of assets (e.g. DAI, UST, WAGMI-DAI LP Tokens, WAGMI-UST LP Tokens, etc) in the Euphoria Treasury, giving it an intrinsic value that it cannot fall below. **Euphoria** also introduces economic and game-theoretic dynamics into the market through staking and purchasing bonds. You can read more about Euphoria [here](https://docs.euphoria.money/)
We're All Gonna Make It (ü§ù, ü§ù)
## Installation This app can be downloaded with [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/)... ```bash pip install Euphoria-CLI ``` ...or directly from github ```bash git clone https://github.com/vinaydawani/euphoria-cli.git cd euphoria-cli pip install . ``` ## Usage Euphoria CLI is pretty easy to use with only 2 commands (as of now) * ```euphoria dashboard``` command can be used to get information about platform like, WAGMI price, APY, Market cap etc. * ```euphoria stake``` command can be used to get information about your balances as well as rebases. ### CLI Options ```bash Options: -a, --address # set the wallet address. Helps the stake fuction to get data for your wallet -va, --view-addr # To view the saved wallet address. -ra, --remove-addr # To remove the saved wallet address. ``` ## Contributing Pull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change. Please make sure to update tests as appropriate. ## License [GNU General Public License v3.0](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/gpl-3.0/) ## Support Me [![Harmony One](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=Harmony%20ONE&message=one1rz766ys3amtcprdu56ltdgu87huuwlhazv4urn&color=79e7e7&logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=&style=for-the-badge)](./qr/harmony.png)
info.keywords: euphoria WAGMI sWAGMI blockchain rebase token bonding staking bond stake
info.name: Euphoria-CLI
info.summary: A small CLI tool to fetch Euphoria's price and stats
